creator: lothar.hegebart@naiads.org
text:
Hi,

i was trying to use Diane's nice script in http://www.mail-archive.com/ant-
user@jakarta.apache.org/msg15554.html and tripped.
As is described in the documentation for 1.5b1 one has to include bsf.jar for 
the script task, but then a class is not found. i guess there exists some 
dependency on rhino-classes. as with rhino (which includes the missing .class-
file) it works fine.
